general_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or navigational structure for a university's website, categorizing information related to student and teacher feedback, university authorities, various policies, academic departments or schools, admissions and courses, campus facilities, and career or placement services. It lists specific feedback types, administrative bodies, policy documents, different schools, admission-related information, and placement details.

admission_requirements.summary: This document outlines the eligibility criteria and intake periods for a program. Admissions are available in September and January, and candidates must possess a valid CAT/GMAT/MAT/NIU-MAT score from the last two years with a minimum of 50 percentile, or alternatively, have at least two years of relevant work experience. Successful applicants will also undergo a personal interview.
admission_requirements.raw_content:
Intakes: September & JanuaryEligibility Criteria:
• Valid CAT/GMAT/MAT/NIU-MAT score (Min. 50 percentile, within last 2 years) OR Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience
• Personal Interview
